mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les regrets et complaintes de tres illustre Princesse Elizabeth d'Austriche, sur le trespas & enterrement du Roy Charles neufiesme de ce nom, son espoux
Lamentations sur la mort du roy
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Chambolle-Duru (Firm)
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Rigaud, Benoist
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Running title: Les lamentations sur la mort du roy.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Chambolle-Duru. Unidentified armorial binding, with monogram "RB" or "BR" in each corner of covers, inside. With motto, In via nulla in via. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 176.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Charles, IX, King of France, 1550-1574
Elisabeth, of Austria, Queen, consort of Charles IX, King of France, 1554-1592
